name: Curtain Hits The Cast "This Is Romance" CD
description:
Hard hitting rock straight out of Connecticut. Sometimes melodic, at other times chaotic Curtain Hits The Cast is set to sit along side bands such as Killswitch Engage, Thrice, Deftones and other genre crossing heavyweights. From the dark lyrics and anthemic cries of Haunting Me to the pummeling blast beats of Letters to the Living, the debut effort entitled “This is Romance” is destined to turn heads.

	Track Listing:
1. Prelude
2. Letters To The Living
3. This Is Romance
4. Closer
5. Haunting Me
6. Breathe
7. The Story Never Ends
8. Maybe
9. By Your Grave
10. Conclusion
11. Closer (Acoustic Bonus Track)
	Visit the Curtain Hits The Cast website at www.curtainhitsthecast.com

name: Sum Of All Fears "From This Day Forward..." CD
description: Seven tracks of pissed off, intense, energetic hardcore. Fast beats, heavy busts and sing-a-longs. A true Connecticut hardcore classic.
